name: The Interrogation Room
description:
You have been kidnapped and have only thirty minutes to escape, with the help of a person with valuable information.

Call a friend, send him the manual, and try to escape with his help.

DOWNLOAD ESCAPE MANUAL

Look only at your screen. 

Spying on your friend's manual can ruin the experience.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Interact

Esc - Pause
